node.translation: I know a bit of Kannada as well.

node.text: में मुश्किल से हिंदी बात करता हूँ|
node.translation: I speak Hindi with some difficulty.
I am currently learning German on Duolingo.

node.text: Bella Ciao, Bella Ciao, Bella Ciao Ciao Ciao!
node.translation: That's all the Italian I know, thanks to Money Heist!
